•	Cartões de Crédito Banrisul: Faça a gestão de seus cartões de crédito, com diversos serviços que vão facilitar seu dia-a-dia. Consulte limites, faturas e melhor dia de compra, registre o uso do cartão no exterior, peça uma nova via, desbloqueie o cartão novo que chegou, gere um Cartão de Crédito Virtual e faça transações online com muito mais segurança. Tudo isso e muito mais, disponível para todos os nossos clientes.
•	Banricompras Vero Pay: Faça compras sem o cartão nas máquinas da rede Banrisul Vero. Você cria um Vero Pay com o valor desejado, com validade de 10 dias. O Vero Pay pode ser enviado a terceiros.
•	Renegociação de Dívidas: Resolva as suas dívidas em atraso sem ter que ir até uma agência.
•	Abertura de Conta Vinculada: Abra uma conta vinculada ao seu CPF. Seu filho ou dependente menor de idade pode ter uma conta nas modalidades de poupança, mesada eletrônica ou conta jovem.
•	Fale com o Seu Gerente: Converse com seu Gerente de Contas via telefone, celular, WhatsApp e e-mail.
•	Espaço Afinidade: Saiba mais sobre opções de contatos e localização, incluindo atalho de geolocalização, da agência onde está o Espaço Afinidade de relacionamento, assim como os demais Espaços Afinidade.
•	Soluções Afinidade: Conheça soluções e oportunidades aderentes e/ou exclusivas aos clientes gerenciados no Banrisul Afinidade, além de conversar diretamente com seu Gerente de Contas.
•	Onde tem Banrisul: Ative seu GPS para visualizar nossas agências e pontos de atendimento próximos a você. Também permite consultas por cidades e bairros.
•	Cotações: Acompanhe a cotação diária de moedas e índices. Dólar, Euro e outras moedas.
•	Consulta de Cheques: Consulte a situação de cheques Banrisul.
•	Telefones Úteis: Acesse nossos canais de atendimento telefônico.
•	Autorização Gov.br: Autorize o seu acesso ao site gov.br com o app Banrisul, facilitando o acesso a diversos serviços do Governo Federal.

Para saber mais sobre o Banrisul, visite o site.

BHIM Axis Pay is a UPI banking app from Axis Bank that lets you transfer money from any bank to any bank account instantly using just a smartphone. You can also make online recharges to prepaid mobile numbers and DTH recharges using BHIM Axis Pay UPI App instantly. Download the free BHIM Axis Pay UPI App and go cashless! What is a UPI App? Unified Payments Interface (UPI) is a payment system created by National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI). UPI allows instant money transfer round the clock without mentioning the details of your bank account such as the account number and IFSC code. A UPI payment app uses a UPI ID to both send and receive money instantly from any bank account without sharing the account number and IFSC Code. For using a UPI banking app such as BHIM Axis Pay, users need to create a UPI ID/Virtual Payment Address (VPA) of their choice and link it to any bank account from a UPI supported bank. For example, a UPI ID for BHIM Axis Pay can be yourname@axisbank or mobilenumber@axisbank etc. which is easy to remember and any bank account can be linked. Once linked, just use your UPI ID instead of your bank account number and branch IFSC code to make or receive instant and cashless mobile payments. Features of BHIM Axis Pay:

* Anyone (Axis Bank customers and non-customers) can use the BHIM Axis Pay UPI banking app to make payments from their mobile to anyone without knowing the recipient's bank details

* You can add both Axis Bank and Non Axis Bank accounts on the BHIM Axis Pay UPI payment app and can also add multiple accounts at the same time

* You can perform instant fund transfer using UPI ID to any bank account right from BHIM Axis Pay money transfer app

* You can link the beneficiaries just by using their UPI ID on the BHIM Axis Pay mobile payment app

* Fund transfers are instant, 24*7, 365 days and absolutely free of cost and take place in a completely safe and secure way

* You can also check the balance of your linked accounts right from the BHIM Axis Pay money transfer app

* You can make prepaid online mobile recharges for all leading Indian telecom providers like Airtel, Vodafone, Reliance Jio, Idea, BSNL, and others from Axis Pay UPI application

* Find the best and the most suitable recharge plans/packs that meet your exact need on the BHIM Axis Pay UPI app. Browse through using different categories like Top-ups, Talk time offers, Data packs - 2G, 3G and 4G, Local, STD, ISD and many more.

* You can use BHIM Axis Pay UPI app to make DTH recharges from your mobile for operators like Tata Sky, Airtel DTH, Dish TV, Videocon D2H, SUN TV, and Reliance BIG TV

* Select Axis bank customers can now get instant credit card through BHIM Axis Pay. To know more on how to get instant credit card, visit www.axisbank.com/instantneocard

How does BHIM Axis Pay work? Getting Started:

* Download the BHIM Axis Pay UPI app from App Store

* Select your preferred bank account

* Create a unique UPI ID (for example – yourname@axisbank)

* Verify your account & set a UPI PIN

How to send money?

* Choose the account to send money from

* Enter receiver’s UPI ID

* Enter amount

* Confirm payment by entering UPI PI

How to ask for money?

* Choose the account to ask money from

* Select receiver’s UPI ID

* Enter amount and send request. Receive money when sender approves the money transfer on his app

How to recharge prepaid mobile online?

* Enter mobile number

* Select plan from Browse Plan

* Confirm online mobile recharge by entering UPI PIN

How to recharge DTH online

* Enter Subscriber ID

* Enter amount

* Confirm DTH recharge by entering UPI PIN

How to check account balance?

* Click on ‘Check balance’

* Enter UPI PIN to confirm 

Go ahead and download BHIM Axis Pay, Axis Bank's cashless UPI payment application for real time settlement and transfer of funds using UPI ID.
